ROBERT E. WILSON
September 17, 1957
Mr, Raymond D, Cheydleur, Chairman*
NAEB Research Committee
Office of the Director of Radio and Television
The Florida State University
Tallahassee, Florida
Dear Rays
Thanks for your letter of September 12.
The chap in our shop who has been working
on various research activities is our Development
Director, Chalmers Marquis* Within the past week
he has sent to Harry Skornia a very complete letter
outlining the things in this field which have been
undertaken here* I think he is your man, and would
suggest that you secure from Harry a copy of this
letter*
